brief_title: A Phase IIa. Open-label, Multicenter, Dose-escalation Study to Assess the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of ZD4054 (Zibotentan) Given Orally Once Daily in Subjects With Metastatic Prostate Cancer
brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to determine the safest dose of ZD4054 (Zibotentan)in men with prostate cancer
description: 1 x 10 mg oral tablets once daily
1 x 10 mg + 2 x 2.5 mg oral tablets once daily
2 x 10 mg + 2 x 2.5 mg oral tablets once daily
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Men 18 years & older - Confirmed diagnosis of prostate cancer with bone metastases Exclusion Criteria: - No more than 2 prior chemotherapy regimens - No radiation, chemotherapy or bisphosphonates in the past 4 weeks
